document.docAuthor: Márquez, Juan, Escoto-Rocha, Jaime & Goyenechea, Irene
document.masterDocTitle: Distribution Patterns of the Mexican Species of Carrion Beetles (Coleoptera: Silphidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Distribution Patterns of the Mexican Species of Carrion Beetles (Coleoptera: Silphidae)
